name: SingItStar: Michael Jackson
overview: The King of Pop finally arrives on SingItStar!!! Song List Includes: 1. The Jackson Five - I Want You Back 2. The Jackson Five - My Girl 3. Michael Jackson - Bad 4. Michael Jackson - Beat It 5. Michael Jackson - Ben 6. Michael Jackson - Billie Jean 7. Michael Jackson - Black or White 8. Michael Jackson - Don't stop till you get enough 9. Michael Jackson - Earth Song 10. Michael Jackson - Heal the world 11. Michael Jackson - Liberian Girl 12. Michael Jackson - Man in the mirror 13. Michael Jackson - Smooth Criminal 14. Michael Jackson - The way You make me Feel 15. Michael Jackson - Wanna be starting something 16. Michael Jackson - You are not alone 17. Michael Jackson - Thriller
